org.apache.http.impl.cookie
类 BasicClientCookie

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.http.impl.cookie.BasicClientCookie
所有已实现的接口：
Cloneable, ClientCookie, Cookie, SetCookie
直接已知子类：
BasicClientCookie2
public class BasicClientCookie
extends Object
implements SetCookie, ClientCookie, Cloneable

HTTP "magic-cookie" represents a piece of state information that the HTTP agent and the target server can exchange to maintain a session.

版本：
$Revision: 659191 $
作者：
B.C. Holmes, Park, Sung-Gu, Doug Sale, Rod Waldhoff, dIon Gillard, Sean C. Sullivan, John Evans, Marc A. Saegesser, Oleg Kalnichevski, Mike Bowler

getExpiryDate

public Date getExpiryDate()
Returns the expiration Date of the cookie, or null if none exists.

Note: the object returned by this method is considered immutable. Changing it (e.g. using setTime()) could result in undefined behaviour. Do so at your peril.

指定者：
接口 Cookie 中的 getExpiryDate
返回：
Expiration Date, or null.

isSecure

public boolean isSecure()
从接口 Cookie 复制的描述
Indicates whether this cookie requires a secure connection.

指定者：
接口 Cookie 中的 isSecure
返回：
true if this cookie should only be sent over secure connections.
另请参见：
setSecure(boolean)

setSecure

public void setSecure(boolean secure)
Sets the secure attribute of the cookie.

When true the cookie should only be sent using a secure protocol (https). This should only be set when the cookie's originating server used a secure protocol to set the cookie's value.

指定者：
接口 SetCookie 中的 setSecure
参数：
secure - The value of the secure attribute
另请参见：
isSecure()

clone

public Object clone()
             throws CloneNotSupportedException
从类 Object 复制的描述
Creates and returns a copy of this Object. The default implementation returns a so-called "shallow" copy: It creates a new instance of the same class and then copies the field values (including object references) from this instance to the new instance. A "deep" copy, in contrast, would also recursively clone nested objects. A subclass that needs to implement this kind of cloning should call super.clone() to create the new instance and then create deep copies of the nested, mutable objects.

返回：
a copy of this object.
抛出：
CloneNotSupportedException - if this object's class does not implement the Cloneable interface.

toString

public String toString()
从类 Object 复制的描述
Returns a string containing a concise, human-readable description of this object. Subclasses are encouraged to override this method and provide an implementation that takes into account the object's type and data. The default implementation simply concatenates the class name, the '@' sign and a hexadecimal representation of the object's Object.hashCode(), that is, it is equivalent to the following expression: 
 getClass().getName() + '@' + Integer.toHexString(hashCode())

覆盖：
类 Object 中的 toString
返回：
a printable representation of this object.
